reviewText: As always, world renowned expert Brion Toss presents material in an easy to assimilate fashion.  The advice provided is both informative and potentially life saving ( you could fall out of that boatswains chair!)  If your contemplating climbing your mast, or might be a crew member asked to perform support duties on deck while another is going aloft, this DVD ( and / or one of Brions classes) should be at the top of your prep list.
